Name: Acid Splash
Description: DAM: Add extra 1d6 at 5th level, 11th level, and 17th level.

Name: Aid
Description: Each target also increases maximum HP by 5.

Name: Alarm
Components: V, S, M (tiny bell, silver wire)
Description: Audible or silent alarm triggered on entry by those you haven't said can enter

Name: Alter Self
Description: Choose one: breathe/swim underwater, natural weapons, change appearance

Name: Animal Friendship
Description: Charm beasts with INT <= 3; spell fails if you hurt beast

Name: Animal Messenger
Description: Beast will relay 25 word message to a target you describe

Name: Animal Shapes
Description: Transform targets into Large or smaller beasts with CR <= 4

Name: Animate Dead
Description: Creates skeleton or zombie servant that accepts simple directions

Name: Animate Objects
Description: Animate objects to accept simple commands.

Name: Antilife Shell
Description: Erects barrier around you that moves with you.  Living creatures cannot enter.

Name: Antimagic Field
Components: V, S, M (powdered iron or filings)
Description: Erects a sphere around you in which all magic no longer works.

Name: Antipathy/Sympathy
Components: V, S, M (lump of alum or honey)
Description: Target object/creature attracts or repels specifc creature types.

Name: Arcane Eye
Components: V, S, M (a bit of bat fur)
Description: Create invisible eye with darkvision(30ft) moves 30ft/rd you can see through.

Name: Arcane Gate
Description: Create two linked portals 10ft. across anybody can travel between.

Name: Arcane Lock
Description: Locks object until password is spoken or dispel/knock. Object break DC +10.

Name: Armor of Agathys
Description: Gain 5 THP. Melee attackers take 5 DAM.

Name: Arms of Hadar
Description: Targets can't take reactions until next turn

Name: Astral Projection
Description: Project to Astral Plane.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Augury
Description: See omen predicting results of action taken within 30 minutes.

Name: Aura of Life
Description: Gain necrotic resistance, HEAL 1 HP if at 0 HP, HP max can't go down.

Name: Aura of Purity
Description: Gain poison resist, disease immune, advantage on status saving throws.

Name: Aura of Vitality
Description: Use bonus action to HEAL 1 target in aura.

Name: Awaken
Description: Target with INT <= 3 gaints INT 10 and can speak. Charmed for 30 days.

Name: Bane
Description: Targets' attack rolls and saving throws are deducted 1d4.

Name: Banishing Smite
Description: Target banished if <= 50 HP.

Name: Banishment
Components: V, S, M (item disliked by target)
Description: Banish target to another plane; native of other plane doesn't return after 1 min.

Name: Barkskin
Description: Target AC is never less than 16 during spell.

Name: Beacon of Hope
Description: Targets get advantage on WIS and death saving throws; heal spells heal max.

Name: Beast Sense
Description: Use action to see/hear whatever beast does.  Use action to return.

Name: Bestow Curse
Description: Curse target.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Bigby's Hand
Description: Create giant hand to do various things.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Blade Barrier
Description: Creatures entering wall/circle area take DAM.

Name: Blade Ward
Description: Gain resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing DMG from weapons.

Name: Bless
Components: V, S, M (sprinkling of holy water)
Description: Targets add 1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws.

Name: Blight
Description: Plants have disadvantage on save and take max DAM.

Name: Blinding Smite
Description: Next melee attack target takes DAM and is blinded until spell ends.

Name: Blindness/Deafness
Description: Target becomes blind or deaf (your choice).

Name: Blink
Description: Roll 11 or higher to go to Ethereal plane between turns; reapper within 10ft.

Name: Blur
Description: Creatures relying on sight have disadvantage to attack.

Name: Branding Smite
Description: Target becomes visible, sheds dim light.

Name: Burning Hands
Description: Flammable objects ignite.

Name: Call Lightning
Description: Targets take DAM each round.  Can change targets each round.

Name: Calm Emotions
Description: Suppress charm effects or hostility on target.

Name: Chain Lightning
Components: V, S, M (bit of fur, glass, 3 silver pins)
Description: Bolt hits one target then forks to up to 3 others.

Name: Charm Person
Description: Charm target so it treats you as friendly. Gets advantage to save if fighting you.

Name: Chill Touch
Description: Extra 1d6 DAM at 5th level, 11th level, and 17th level. Can't regain HP.

Name: Chromatic Orb
Description: Choose type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

Name: Circle of Death
Components: V, S, M (crushed black pearl 500 gp)

Name: Circle of Power
Description: Friendlies: advantage on saving throws against magic/effects. No half DAM.

Name: Clairvoyance
Components: V, S, M (jeweled horn or glass eye 100 gp)
Description: Create sensor in area you can see or hear through.

Name: Clone
Description: Create clone of living person; soul transfers to clone if original dies.

Name: Cloud of Daggers
Description: DAM taken on entering or starting turn in area.

Name: Cloudkill
Description: DAM taken on entering or starting turn in area. Fog moves away 10 ft. per turn.

Name: Color Spray
Components: V, S, M (pinch of colored powder)
Description: Blinds 6d10 HP worth of creatures, starting with lowest HP.

Name: Command
Description: Speak 1 word command to target. Can't cause harm. Doesn't affect undead.

Name: Commune
Components: V, S, M (incense, vial of holy water)
Description: Ask 3 yes/no questions that are answered by deity.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Commune with Nature
Description: Gain knowledge of the land around you.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Compelled Duel
Description: Compel target to attack you one-on-one.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Comprehend Languages
Components: V, S, M (pinch of soot and salt)
Description: Know literal meaning of any speech. Understand written words while touching.

Name: Compulsion
Description: Compel targets to move in specified non-hazardous direction.

Name: Cone of Cold
Components: V, S, M (crystal or glass cone)
Description: Creatures killed become frozen statues.

Name: Confusion
Description: Targets can't take reactions and do random actions.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Conjure Animals
Description: Summon fey spirits as creatures (total CR <= 2) that act as a group.

Name: Conjure Barrage
Components: V, S, M (ammo or thrown weapon)
Description: Damage type is same as ammo/weapon used as component.

Name: Conjure Celestial
Description: Summon celestial CR <= 4.  Obeys commands that don't violate alignment.

Name: Conjure Elemental
Description: Summon elemental CR <= 5.  Obeys commands. Hostile if control is lost.

Name: Conjure Fey
Description: Summon fey CR <= 6. Obeys commands. Hostile if control is lost.

Name: Conjure Minor Elementals
Description: Summon elementals (total CR <= 2) that obey commands.

Name: Conjure Volley
Components: V, S, M (ammo or thrown weapon)
Description: Damage type is same as ammo/weapon used as component.

Name: Conjure Woodland Beings
Components: V, S, M (1 holly berry per creature)
Description: Summon fey creatures (CR <= 2) that obey commands.

Name: Contact Other Plane
Description: Contact extraplanar being. YOU make save. 1-word answers to 5 questions.

Name: Contagion
Description: Give creature a disease.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Contingency
Components: V, S, M (ivory statue of self 1500 gp)
Description: Spell <= 5th level activates when condition occurs. That spell's slot used too.

Name: Continual Flame
Description: Heatless flame comes from object. Can be covered but not snuffed out.

Name: Control Water
Components: V, S, M (water drop, pinch of dust)
Description: Control water.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Control Weather
Components: V, S, M (incense, earth&wood in water)
Description: Control the weather.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Cordon of Arrows
Components: V, S, M (4 pieces of ammo)
Description: Ammo fired at creatures within 30 ft. Spell ends when ammo gone.

Name: Counterspell
Description: Interrupt spell <= 4th. You make casting ability check (DC 10 + spell level).

Name: Create Food and Water
Description: Create 45 lbs. of bland, nourishing food for 24 hours and 30 gallons of water.

Name: Create or Destroy Water
Area: 10 gal. water/30 ft. cube of fog
Description: Create/destroy 10 gal. of water or 30 ft. cube of rain/fog.

Name: Create Undead
Description: Create undead to serve you for 24 hours.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Creation
Components: V, S, M (bit of matter you want to make)
Description: Make nonliving object no larger than 5 ft. cube.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Crown of Madness
Description: Charm humanoid to attack your target of choice.  Use action to keep control.

Name: Crusader's Mantle
Description: Nonhostiles in aura deal an extra 1d4 radiant DAM.

Name: Cure Wounds
Description: HEAL: 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier. No effect on undead or constructs.

Name: Dancing Lights
Description: Create 4 glowing, hovering objects that shed light out 10 ft. Can move 60 ft.

Name: Darkness
Components: V, M (bat fur and pitch or coal)
Description: Creates darkness normal light can't dispel. Dispels light spells <= 2nd level.

Name: Darkvision
Components: V, S, M (dried carrot or agate)
Description: Grants creature darkvision (60 ft.) but can't see in Darkness aura.

Name: Daylight
Description: Creates bright light. Dispels darkness spells <= 3rd level it overlaps with.

Name: Death Ward
Description: 1 use: Target drops to 1 HP instead of 0 HP or negates instant kill effect.

Name: Delayed Blast Fireball
Components: V, S, M (tiny ball of guano and sulfur)
Description: Creates spot where fireball will erupt.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Demiplane
Description: Create door to 30 ft. cubic room in demiplane. Trapped if there when spell ends.

Name: Destructive Wave
Description: Targets in circle take thunder DAM, then radiant or necrotic DAM; go prone.

Name: Detect Evil and Good
Description: Know location of aberration,celestial,elemental,fey,fiend,undead,(un)holy ground.

Name: Detect Magic
Description: Sense presence of magic. Use action to see auras around creatures/objects.

Name: Detect Poison and Disease
Description: Sense location and type of disease, poison, or poisonous creature.

Name: Detect Thoughts
Description: Read thoughts of those around you.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Dimension Door
Description: Teleport yourself and ally to location. If occupied, 4d6 force DAM and spell fails.

Name: Disguise Self
Description: Create illusion to appear as someone else.  Foiled by Investigation vs. spell DC.

Name: Disintegrate
Components: V, S, M (lodestone and pinch of dust)
Description: If target drops to 0 HP, is disintegrated. Only revived by True Resurrection.

Name: Dispel Evil and Good
Components: V, S, M (holy water or silver/iron powder)
Description: Fey,undead,extraplanar creatures have disadvantaged attacks. See Sourcebook.

Name: Dispel Magic
Description: End spell <= 3rd level. For >= 4th level, casting ability check DC=10+spell level.

Name: Dissonant Whispers
Description: Target immediately uses reaction to move as far away as possible.

Name: Divination
Components: V, S, M (incense, sac. offering 25 gp)
Description: Question about one event in next 7 days answered by phrase or omen.

Name: Divine Favor
Description: Your weapon attacks deal extra 1d4 radiant DAM on a hit.

Name: Divine Word
Description: Targets suffer effects based on their current HP.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Dominate Beast
Description: Charm beast to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.

Name: Dominate Monster
Description: Charm monster to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.

Name: Dominate Person
Description: Charm humanoid to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.

Name: Drawmij's Instant Summons
Description: Speak item name and crush gem to summon object unless it's held by other.

Name: Dream
Components: V, S, M (sand, ink, quill from asleep bird)
Description: Shape creature's dreams.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Druidcraft
Description: Create minor druidic effect.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Earthquake
Components: V, S, M (piece of dirt, rock, and clay)
Description: Create a seismic disturbance with various effects.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Eldritch Blast
Description: Beam. 2 beams at 5th level, 3 at 11th, 4 at 17th. Can choose different targets.

Name: Elemental Weapon
Description: Weapon is +1 to hit and +1d4 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder DAM.

Name: Enhance Ability
Components: V, S, M (fur or feather from a beast)
Description: Target creature gains a beneficial effect.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Enlarge/Reduce
Description: Enlarge or reduce target.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Ensnaring Strike
Description: Restrain target. Large and bigger creatures have advantage to save.

Name: Entangle
Description: Creatures become restrained.Use action to use STR against spell DC to escape.

Name: Enthrall
Description: Disadvantage to see anybody but you; attacked ones have advantage to save.

Name: Etherealness
Description: Become ethereal.  Move up/down at half speed.  Can't see past 60 ft.

Name: Evard's Black Tentacles
Components: V, S, M (piece of octopus tentacle)
Description: Also restrained. Restrained take DAM every turn. STR/DEX check to get free.

Name: Expeditious Retreat
Description: You can take Dash as a bonus action until spell ends.

Name: Eyebite
Description: Affect targets negatively.  New target each turn.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Fabricate
Description: Convert raw materials into object no bigger than 5 ft. cube.

Name: Faerie Fire
Description: Objects/creatures in cube are outlined in light and are attacked with advantage.

Name: False Life
Components: V, S, M (alcohol or distilled spirits)
Description: You gain 1d4+4 temp HP.

Name: Fear
Components: V, S, M (white feather or hen heart)
Description: Targets drop everything and use Dash to run away. WIS save once out of sight.

Name: Feather Fall
Components: V, M (small feather or piece of down)
Description: Targets' descent slows to 60 ft. per round, takes no DAM, and can land on feet.

Name: Feeblemind
Components: V, S, M (clay, crystal, or mineral spheres)
Description: Creature INT and CHA scores become 1.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Feign Death
Components: V, S, M (pinch of graveyard dirt)
Description: Creature appears dead.  Resists all non-psychic DMG. Disease/poison delayed.

Name: Find Familiar
Components: V, S, M (charcoal, incense, herbs 10 gp)
Description: Gain the service of a familiar.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Find Steed
Description: Summons a spirit in the form of a steed.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Find the Path
Components: V, S, M (diviner tools, object from target 100 gp)
Description: Find the shortest, most direct route to a place you are familiar with.

Name: Find Traps
Description: Sense the presence (not location) of any magical or mundane trap nearby.

Name: Finger of Death
Description: Humanoids killed rise as a zombie next turn permanently under your control.

Name: Fire Bolt
Description: DAM at 5th level: 2d10, at 11th level: 3d10, at 17th level: 4d10.

Name: Fire Shield
Components: V, S, M (bit of phosphorous or a firefly)
Description: Choose warm or chill shield. Melee attackers take DMG. Light out 10 ft./20 ft.

Name: Fire Storm
Description: Each cube must face at least one other cube. Can choose not to affect plants.

Name: Fireball
Components: V, S, M (tiny ball of guano and sulfur)
Description: Fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects.

Name: Flame Blade
Description: Create fiery scimitar that sheds bright light 10ft. and dim light for another 10ft.

Name: Flame Strike
Description: Creatures take fire and radiant damage.

Name: Flaming Sphere
Components: V, S, M (tallow, brimstone, iron powder)
Description: Creatures next to spheres at end of turn take DAM. Move spheres 30 ft.

Name: Flesh to Stone
Components: V, S, M (pinch of lime, water, and earth)
Description: Restrained on first fail. Petrified after 3 fails.

Name: Fly
Description: Target gains fly (60 ft.).  Fall if spell ends while in air.

Name: Fog Cloud
Description: Creates a foggy sphere.  Can be banished by moderate wind.

Name: Forbiddance
Components: V, S, M (holy water, incense, ruby powder 1000 gp)
Description: Can't teleport/gate into area. A creature type you choose takes DMG in area.

Name: Forcecage
Description: Creatures stuck in cage can only leave using magic after CHA save.

Name: Foresight
Description: Not surprised. Advantage:attacks,checks,saves. Disadvantage getting attacked.

Name: Freedom of Movement
Components: V, S, M (leather strap around arm)
Description: Immune to difficult terrain,slow,paralyze,restrain. Spend 5ft to escape restrain.

Name: Friends
Description: Advantage on CHA checks to target, who knows magic used once spell ends.

Name: Gaseous Form
Components: V, S, M (bit of gauze and wisp of smoke)
Description: Cloud form. Fly(10ft.). Resist nonmagical DMG. STR/DEX/CON save advantage.

Name: Gate
Description: Create portal to precise location on another plane or near a specific person.

Name: Geas
Description: Target must perform task you set. 5d10 psychic DAM whenever it disobeys.

Name: Gentle Repose
Components: V, S, M (salt and 1 cp on each eye)
Description: Preserves corpse.  Extends time limit of Raise Dead spell.

Name: Giant Insect
Description: Turn insects into giant insects that obey your commands.

Name: Glibness
Description: Can replace CHA check rolls with a 15. Spells always detect you telling truth.

Name: Globe of Invulnerability
Components: V, S, M (glass or crystal bead)
Description: Spells <= 5th level cannot affect those within the globe.

Name: Glyph of Warding
Components: V, S, M (incense, diamond powder 200 gp)
Description: Create a magical trap.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Goodberry
Description: Create <= 10 berries that HEAL 1 HP each. Expire after 24 hours.

Name: Grasping Vine
Description: Create vine that lashes out 30 ft. away. Targets failing save pulled 20 ft. to vine.

Name: Grease
Components: V, S, M (pork rind or butter)
Description: Creatures in area or entering area fall prone if they fail DEX save.

Name: Greater Invisibility
Description: Become invisible until spell ends.

Name: Greater Restoration
Description: End a debilitating effect on target.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Guardian of Faith
Description: Create spectral guardian that attacks hostiles. Leaves after dealing 60 DAM.

Name: Guards and Wards
Description: Protect an area of space.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Guidance
Description: Once, add 1d4 to an ability check.

Name: Guiding Bolt
Description: Next attack roll against target before end of your next turn has advantage.

Name: Gust of Wind
Description: Push targets 15 ft. in directon of wind. Creatures move half speed against wind.

Name: Hail of Thorns
Description: Target hit by ranged attack and those adjacent who fail save hit by thorns.

Name: Hallow
Components: V, S, M (herbs, oil, incense 1000 gp)
Description: Infuse area with holy or unholy power.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Components: V, S, M (stone, twig, bit of green plant)
Description: Make natural terrain seem like other terrain. Investigation check to disbelieve.

Name: Harm
Description: Max HP reduced by same amount as DAM. Target cannot fall below 1 HP.

Name: Haste
Components: V, S, M (shaving of licorice root)
Description: Doubles speed. +2 AC. Advantage on DEX saves. Additional action to Dash.

Name: Heal
Description: Ends blindness, deafness, any diseases. No effect on constructs/undead.

Name: Healing Word
Description: Target HEAL 1d4 + spellcasting ability. No effect on constructs/undead.

Name: Heat Metal
Components: V, S, M (piece of iron and a flame)
Description: Heat metallic objects including weapons and armor.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Hellish Rebuke
Description: Magical counterattack to taking damage.

Name: Heroes' Feast
Description: Cure:disease,poison.Immune:poison,fright.HP max +2d10,WIS save advantage.

Name: Heroism
Description: Immune to being frightened. Temp HP equal to casting ability modifier each turn.

Name: Hex
Components: V, S, M (petrified eye of a newt)
Description: Target takes 1d6 necrotic DAM when you hit it;disadvantage on ability of choice.

Name: Hold Monster
Components: V, S, M (small straight piece of iron)
Description: Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn. Doesn't work on undead.

Name: Hold Person
Components: V, S, M (small straight piece of iron)
Description: Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn.

Name: Holy Aura
Components: V, S, M (reliquary containing sacred relic 1000 gp)
Description: Aura helps allies and hurts enemies.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Hunger of Hadar
Description: Start turn in area: 2d6 cold DAM.End turn in area: DEX save or 2d6 acid DAM.

Name: Hunter's Mark
Description: Mark quarry. Extra 1d6 DAM on weapon hit. Advantage on rolls to find it.

Name: Hypnotic Pattern
Description: Creatures charmed, incapacitated, speed = 0. Spell ends on DAM or shaking.

Name: Ice Storm
Components: V, S, M (pinch of dust, drop of water)
Description: Storm's area of effect becomes difficult terrain until end of next turn.

Name: Identify
Components: V, S, M (pearl, owl feather 100 gp)
Description: Learn what an item is and what spells affect it.

Name: Illusory Script
Description: Write magical script on surface that only designated people can read.

Name: Imprisonment
Description: Magically restrain a creature.  See sourcebook.

Name: Incendiary Cloud
Description: Targets make save when cloud created or entering or exiting it. Cloud move: 10ft.

Name: Inflict Wounds
Description: Inflict necrotic damage on target.

Name: Insect Plague
Components: V, S, M (bit of sugar, grain, and fat)
Description: Targets make save when swarm created or entering or exiting it.

Name: Invisibility
Components: V, S, M (eyelash in gum arabic)
Description: Target becomes invisible. Ends if target attacks or casts a spell.

Name: Jump
Description: Target's jump distance tripled until spell ends.

Name: Knock
Description: Open mundane lock or suppress an Arcane Lock for 10 minutes. Loud knock.

Name: Legend Lore
Components: V, S, M (incense(250), 4 ivory strips(50) 300 gp)
Description: Learn lore about target. Information is accurate but might use figurative words.

Name: Leomund's Secret Chest
Components: V, S, M (chest(5000), replica chest(50) 5050 gp)
Description: Transport chest back and forth from Ethereal Plane using replica.

Name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
Description: Protect <= 9 creatures in hut from spells, creatures, elements.

Name: Lesser Restoration
Description: End one disease or condition (blind, deaf, paralyzed, poisoned) on target.

Name: Levitate
Components: V, S, M (small leather loop or golden wire)
Description: Target <= 500 lbs. floats 20 ft.Can move up/down 20ft./turn. Floats down on end.

Name: Light
Description: Object sheds light in 20 ft. radious. Hostile targets get DEX save.

Name: Lightning Arrow
Description: Creatures within 10 ft. of initial target also take 2d8 DAM (DEX save for half).

Name: Lightning Bolt
Components: V, S, M (bit of fur and glass rod)
Description: Lightning ignites flammable objects.

Name: Locate Animals or Plants
Description: Name a kind of beast or plant and find the nearest one within 5 miles.

Name: Locate Creature
Description: Sense creature direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.

Name: Locate Object
Description: Sense object direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.

Name: Longstrider
Description: Target's speed increases by 10 ft.

Name: Mage Armor
Components: V, S, M (piece of cured leather)
Description: If target isn't wearing armor, its base AC becomes 13 + DEX modifier.

Name: Mage Hand
Description: Create spectral hand that manipulates objects. Can pick up <= 10 lbs.

Name: Magic Circle
Components: V, S, M (holy water or fe/ag dust 100 gp)
Description: Hinder one creature type within cylinder.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Magic Jar
Description: Your soul enters an external object.  See sourcebook.

Name: Magic Missile
Description: You choose the target for each dart that does 1d4+1 DAM.

Name: Magic Mouth
Components: V, S, M (honeycomb and jade dust 10 gp)
Description: Magic mouth repeats <= 25 word message once condition is met.

Name: Magic Weapon
Description: Nonmagical weapon becomes +1.

Name: Major Image
Description: Create image of object including sounds, smells. Investigation check to foil.

Name: Mass Cure Wounds
Description: Creatures HEAL 3d8 + casting ability modifier. No effect on undead/constructs.

Name: Mass Heal
Description: Targets HEAL total of 700 HP and cured of diseases, blindness, and deafness.

Name: Mass Healing Word
Description: Targets HEAL 1d4 + casting ability modifier. No effect on undead/constructs.

Name: Mass Suggestion
Description: Make creatures accept reasonable sounding suggestions. See Sourcebook.

Name: Maze
Description: Target uses action each turn to make INT check (DC 20) to escape.

Name: Meld into Stone
Description: Meld into stone walls or large stone objects.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Melf's Acid Arrow
Components: V, S, M (rhubarb leaf, adder's stomach)
Description: Half DAM on miss. On hit, target also takes 2d4 acid DAM at end of next turn.

Name: Mending
Description: Mends one break or tear no larger than 1ft. in a mundane object.

Name: Message
Components: V, S, M (piece of copper wire)
Description: Point at target and whisper a message. They can whisper a response.

Name: Meteor Swarm
Description: Also damages objects and ignites flammable objects.

Name: Mind Blank
Description: Target immune to psychic damage, charm, mind reading, divinations.

Name: Minor Illusion
Description: Create illusory sound or image. Investigation check against spell DC to detect.

Name: Mirage Arcane
Description: Create audo,visual,tactile, and olfactory illusion. Only Truesight can detect.

Name: Mirror Image
Description: Create duplicates that make you harder to hit.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Mislead
Description: Become invisible and create illusory double. Use action to move your double.

Name: Misty Step
Description: Teleport <= 30 ft. away to unoccupied location.

Name: Modify Memory
Description: Reshape another creature's memories.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Moonbeam
Description: DAM taken entering/start turn in beam. Shapechanges disadvantage to save.

Name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
Components: V, S, M (silver whistle, bone, thread)
Description: Spectral hound guards area and can attack hostiles.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion
Components: V, S, M (portal(5), marble(5), spoon(5) 15 gp)
Description: Summon portal to 50000 cubic ft. mansion with food for 100 people.

Name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
Components: V, S, M (lead, glass, cloth, chrysolite)
Description: Create magically secure area.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Mordenkainen's Sword
Components: V, S, M (mini platinum sword 250 gp)
Description: Use bonus action each turn to move sword <= 20 ft. and attack again.

Name: Move Earth
Components: V, S, M (iron blade, bag of soil)
Description: Reshape dirt, sand, or clay. Can move to different square after 10 minutes.

Name: Nondetection
Description: Hide target from all divination and scrying magic.

Name: Nystul's Magic Aura
Components: V, S, M (small square of silk)
Description: Divination spells reveal false info about target.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
Description: Water freezes. Can give globe to another who fires it and spell takes effect then.

Name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
Components: V, S, M (hemispheres of crystal, arabic)
Description: Trap creature in sphere.  Sphere only destroyed by Disintegrate spell.

Name: Otto's Irresistable Dance
Description: No movement.Disadvantage on DEX saves and attacks.Use action to WIS save.

Name: Pass without Trace
Components: V, S, M (mistletoe or spruce ash)
Description: Targets get +10 to Stealth checks and can only be tracked by magic.

Name: Passwall
Components: V, S, M (pinch of sesame seeds)
Description: Create 5ft wide, 8ft tall,20ft deep opening in wall, ceiling, or floor.

Name: Phantasmal Force
Description: Affect target with illusion. Can DAM for 1d6 Psychic. See Sourcebook.

Name: Phantasmal Killer
Description: Target is frightened and takes DAM at start of turn if it doesn't save.

Name: Phantom Steed
Description: You and 1 other can ride phantom steed. Speed=100ft or 10mph (13 fast).

Name: Planar Ally
Description: Ask otherworldly entity for aid.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Planar Binding
Description: Bind celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to serve you for spell duration.

Name: Plane Shift
Components: V, S, M (forked metal rod 250 gp)
Description: Transport to another plane. You specify general location or teleportation circle.

Name: Plant Growth
Description: Cast short term (creatures move 1/4 speed) or long term (double food yield).

Name: Poison Spray
Description: DAM increase. 5th level: 2d12, 11th level: 3d12, 17th level: 4d12.

Name: Polymorph
Description: Transform creature's form. All stats change. Limited to actions of new form.

Name: Power Word Heal
Description: Target also cured of charm, fright, paralyze, or stun. Use reaction to stand up.

Name: Power Word Kill
Description: If target has <= 100 HP, it dies instantly. No effect otherwise. No saving throw.

Name: Power Word Stun
Description: Target <= 150 HP is stunned. Nothing otherwise. CON save at end of turn to end.

Name: Prayer of Healing
Description: Targets HEAL 2d8 + casting ability modifier HP. No effect on undead/constructs.

Name: Prestidigitation
Description: Create minor magical effect.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Prismatic Spray
Description: Send a rainbow of negative effects at enemies.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Prismatic Wall
Description: Create multicolored barrier with various effects.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Produce Flame
Description: Create flame. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d8, 11th level: 3d8, 17th level: 4d8.

Name: Programmed Illusion
Components: V, S, M (fleece, jade dust 25 gp)
Description: Create illusion that performs specific action triggered by specific action.

Name: Project Image
Components: V, S, M (small replica of self 5 gp)
Description: Create image of self you can see/hear/speak/move (x2 speed) through.

Name: Protection from Energy
Description: Creature gains resistance to one of: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

Name: Protection from Evil and Good
Components: V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver)
Description: Protect against certain types of creatures.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Protection from Poison
Description: Target has 1 poison neutralized, advantage on poison save, resists poison DAM.

Name: Purify Food and Drink
Description: All nonmagical food and drink in range is rendered free of poison and disease.

Name: Raise Dead
Description: Return target to life with 1 HP.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Rary's Telepathic Bond
Components: V, S, M (eggshell of 2 different creatures)
Description: Targets can communicate telepathically with each other, but not to other planes.

Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Description: Target deals 1/2 DMG with STR weapon attacks. CON save to end at turn's end.

Name: Ray of Frost
Description: Speed -10ft. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d8, 11th level: 3d8, 17th level: 4d8.

Name: Ray of Sickness
Description: Target also makes CON save. On fail, poisoned until end of next turn.

Name: Regenerate
Components: V, S, M (prayer wheel and holy water)
Description: Target HEAL 1 HP at start of every turn. Severed parts return after 2 minutes.

Name: Reincarnate
Components: V, S, M (rare oils and unguents 1000 gp)
Description: Resurrect dead humanoid into a random humanoid body.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Remove Curse
Description: Remove curse creature or break object's curse attunement to any target.

Name: Resistance
Description: Once before spell ends, add 1d4 to a saving throw. Roll before or after save.

Name: Resurrection
Description: Resurrect dead creaature. See Sourcebook.

Name: Reverse Gravity
Components: V, S, M (lodestone and iron filings)
Description: Creatures fall upwards, taking falling damage. Fall again once spell ends.

Name: Revivify
Description: Raise creature that died within 1 minute to 1 HP. Doesn't restore missing parts.

Name: Rope Trick
Components: V, S, M (powdered corn, parchment loop)
Description: Climb rope to other space that can hide 8 Medium creatures. Can see outside.

Name: Sacred Flame
Description: No cover. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d8, 11th level: 3d8, 17th level: 4d8.

Name: Sanctuary
Description: Those choosing to attack target must make WIS save or choose new target.

Name: Scorching Ray
Description: Shoot 3 rays at up to 3 targets.

Name: Scrying
Description: Spy on a target located on the same plane as you.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Searing Smite
Description: Target takes initial DAM and CON save at start of each turn or take 1d6 fire.

Name: See Invisibility
Components: V, S, M (pinch of talc and silver powder)
Description: See invisible and ethereal creatures.

Name: Seeming
Description: Disguise willing or unwillig creatures as other similar creatures, including outfits.

Name: Sending
Components: V, S, M (short piece of fine copper wire)
Description: Send <= 25 word message to known creature. Get similar reply.

Name: Sequester
Description: Hide target from detection, falls into suspended animation. Condition can end it.

Name: Shapechange
Description: Assume the form of a different creature.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Shatter
Description: Inorganic creatures have disadvantage to save. Objects take DAM too.

Name: Shield
Description: Gain +5 bonus to AC, including triggering attack. Negates Magic Missile attacks.

Name: Shield of Faith
Components: V, S, M (small parchment with holy text)
Description: Target gains +2 bonus to AC.

Name: Shillelagh
Description: Use casting ability instead of STR for attack,damage. Weapon does 1d8 DMG.

Name: Shocking Grasp
Description: Target can't take reactions until next turn. Advantage if target has metal armor.

Name: Silence
Description: Creatures in area are deafened, immune to thunder DMG, can't cast verbally.

Name: Silent Image
Description: Create visual-only illusion. Use action to make it move. Investigation to discover.

Name: Simulacrum
Description: Create duplicate of beast or humanoid that obeys your commands.

Name: Sleep
Components: V, S, M (pinch of fine sand)
Description: 5d8 total HP of creatures in area fall asleep. Go in order of lowest HP to hightest.

Name: Sleet Storm
Components: V, S, M (pinch of dust, drops of water)
Description: Difficult terrain.Each turn,DEX save or fall prone,CON save or lose concentration.

Name: Slow
Description: Affected creatures become slowed.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Spare the Dying
Description: Stabilize dying creature.  No effect on undead or constructs.

Name: Speak with Animals
Description: Understand and speak to beasts. Get info about nearby locations and monsters.

Name: Speak with Dead
Description: Ask corpse <= 5 questions. Get brief, cryptic answers. Can be lies.

Name: Speak with Plants
Description: Animate plants to communicate with and perform tasks.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Spider Climb
Components: V, S, M (spider and drop of bitumen)
Description: Target can walk on walls or ceiling. Climbing speed becomes walking speed.

Name: Spike Growth
Components: V, S, M (7 sharp thorns or twigs)
Description: Difficult terrain.  Moving into or within area takes 2d4 piercing DAM per 5 ft.

Name: Spirit Guardian
Description: Enemy creature speed halved. DMG on enter area: necrotic if evil, radiant if not.

Name: Spiritual Weapon
Description: Magical weapon does 1d8 + casting ability DMG. Can move 20 ft. per turn.

Name: Staggering Smite
Description: WIS save or disadvantage on attack & ability checks; can't take reactions.

Name: Stinking Cloud
Components: V, S, M (rotten egg or skunk cabbage)
Description: Creatures that need to breathe spend turn retching. Wind disperses cloud.

Name: Stone Shape
Components: V, S, M (soft clay in desired shape)
Description: Reshape stone into any rough shape you wish.

Name: Stoneskin
Description: Target gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing DMG.

Name: Storm of Vengeance
Description: Magical storm attacks targets in range.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Suggestion
Description: Target follows reasonable course of action you suggest. Can specify conditions.

Name: Sunbeam
Description: Creatures are blinded until your next turn. Use your action to make a new line.

Name: Sunburst
Components: V, S, M (fire and piece of sunstone)
Description: Creatures are blinded for 1 minute (CON save at end of turn to end).

Name: Swift Quiver
Components: V, S, M (quiver with at least 1 ammo)
Description: Quiver produces endless ammo.Use bonus action for 2 attacks using ammo.

Name: Symbol
Components: V, S, M (hg, p, diamond, and opal 1000 gp)
Description: Inscribe harmful magical glyph on surface.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
Components: V, S, M (tiny tarts and a feather)
Description: Target (INT > 4) is prone, incapacitated, can't stand. WIS save each turn to end.

Name: Telekinesis
Description: Move objects or creatures with your mind.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Telepathy
Components: V, S, M (pair of linked silver rings)
Description: Telepathically communicate words, sounds, images with target (INT >= 1).

Name: Teleport
Description: Teleport yourself and willing creatures to a distant location.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Teleportation Circle
Components: V, M (chalk & ink mixed with gems 50 gp)
Description: Any stepping inside circle teleport to permanent teleportation circle.

Name: Tenser's Floating Disk
Description: Create floating disk that holds 500 lbs and stays within 20 ft. of you.

Name: Thaumaturgy
Description: Create minor magical effect.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Thorn Whip
Components: V, S, M (stem of thorny plant)
Description: Pulled 10 ft to root. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d6, 11th level: 3d6, 17th level: 4d6.

Name: Thunderous Smite
Description: Attack target takes extra thunder DAM and STR save or pushed 10 ft. and prone.

Name: Thunderwave
Description: Creatures failing save and objects pushed 10 ft. Boom heard for 300 ft.

Name: Time Stop
Description: Stop time. Take 1d4+1 turns alone. Spell ends if you affect others in any way.

Name: Tongues
Components: V, M (clay model of a ziggurat)
Description: Target understands any spoken language and is understood by everyone else.

Name: Transport via Plants
Description: Enter one plant and emerge from another on same plane you've encountered.

Name: Tree Stride
Description: Enter one tree and emerge from another 500 ft. away. Use once per round.

Name: True Polymorph
Components: V, S, M (mercury, gum arabic, smoke)
Description: Transform a creature/object into a different creature/object.  See Sourcebook.

Name: True Resurrection
Components: V, S, M (holy water, diamonds 25000 gp)
Description: Resurrect creature that didn't die of old age. Heals all wounds, effects, etc.

Name: True Seeing
Components: V, S, M (ointment for eyes 25 gp)
Description: Target creature gains truesight, sees secret doors, Ethereal Plane. Range 120 ft.

Name: True Strike
Description: Next turn you gain advantage on first attack against the target.

Name: Tsunami
Area: 300 ft x 300 ft x 50 ft water
Description: Creatures make STR save to avoid more damage (1d10 less DMG each round).

Name: Unseen Servant
Components: V, S, M (piece of string, bit of wood)
Description: Create invisible force that can perform simple, menial tasks for you.

Name: Vampiric Touch
Description: Each time you hit a target, you also HEAL half of the DAM you cause.

Name: Vicious Mockery
Description: Disadvantage to attack.DAM increase.5th level:2d4,11th level:3d4,17th level:4d4

Name: Wall of Fire
Components: V, S, M (small piece of phosphorous)
Description: Those entering or ending turn on one side of the wall take 5d8 fire DAM.

Name: Wall of Force
Components: V, S, M (powder from clear gemstone)
Description: Create impenetrable wall (even into Ethereal Plane) only unmade by Disintegrate.

Name: Wall of Ice
Components: V, S, M (small piece of quartz)
Description: Ice:AC 12, 30 HP. Moving through ice:take 5d6 cold DAM or CON save for half.

Name: Wall of Stone
Components: V, S, M (small block of granite)
Description: Create wall of stone or other stone structure.  See Sourcebook.

Name: Wall of Thorns
Description: Move through wall at 1/4 speed and take 7d8 slashing DAM (DEX save for half).

Name: Warding Bond
Components: V, S, M (pair of platinum rings 50 gp)
Description: Target (60ft) has +1 AC and saves, resistance to all DAM, shares DAM with you.

Name: Water Breathing
Components: V, S, M (short reed or piece of straw)
Description: Creatures gain ability to breathe underwater using normal respiration.

Name: Water Walk
Description: Creaturess walk on liquid, rise 60 ft. per round if under. Still take other damage.

Name: Web
Description: Every turn:DEX save or restrain;STR save to escape.Burning webs:2d4 fire DAM.

Name: Weird
Description: Affected creatures make WIS saves each turn and take DAM until they save.

Name: Wind Walk
Components: V, S, M (fire and holy water)
Description: Fly speed: 300 ft. Resist weapons.Only Dash in cloud form. Can revert to normal.

Name: Wind Wall
Components: V, S, M (tiny fan and exotic feather)
Description: Strong wind keeps gases, flying creatures, projectiles, gaseous creatures away.

Name: Wish
Description: Replicate and spell <= 8th level or other powerful effect granted. See Sourcebook.

Name: Witch Bolt
Components: V, S, M (twig from tree struck by lightning)
Description: Use action to auto hit target hit last round for 1d12 lightning DAM if in range.

Name: Word of Recall
Description: Instantly teleport to sanctuary you select during prep associated with your deity.

Name: Wrathful Smite
Description: Target hit also makes WIS save or is frightened. WIS save to end effect.

Name: Zone of Truth
Description: You know which fail saves. They can't lie but know of spell and can be evasive.
